name: Medieval 2: Total War
description: A list of cheats for Medieval 2: Total War Game

Console codes.val: Allows a character to move again
Allows you to give a city more population automatically
Allows you to give any trait your faction can have to a specific general
Anything in the city's building queue will be built automatically
Gives you the specific amount of gold
Toggles on or off the fog of war
When at the battle scroll, input this code in, attacker if attacking, defender if defending and press auto retaliate button. Automatically wins

Adding Units to Stacks.val: Add Elephant Artillery to the selected settlement
Add Elephant Rocketeer to the selected settlement
Add Elephants to the selected settlement
Add Mercenary Monster Bombard to the selected settlement
Add Mercenary Monster Ribault to the selected settlement
Add Mercenary Rocket Launcher to the selected settlement
